lyrics:
My wish came true (My wish came true)
When I met you (When I met you)
I've searched and searched
My whole life through (My whole life through)

There's just one thing (There's just one thing)
Dear, before we start (before we start)
Don't say you care
Then break my heart (Then break my heart)

When you speak of love
Please be sincere
For if you play with love
It can bring tears, my dear

My wish came true (My wish came true)
To my surprise (To my surprise)
When you stood there
Before my eyes (Before my eyes)

And when my heart (And when my heart)
Started beating fast (Started beating fast)
It was then I knew
I found true love at last
